description:
Barnaby Costea was an officer in the Free Planets Alliance military who served as the commander of the Econia Internment Camp in 788 UC.
For years, Costea had been embezzling camp funds to a secret account in Fezzan. When Yang Wen-li was transferred to the camp in November of 788 UC, Costea feared that he was under secret orders to investigate Costea`s wrongdoings. These fears led to the subsequent events on Econia.
Gineipedia
name: Barnaby Costea
